message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product and I think you'd really love it. I'm asking for $150 for it, but I'm open to negotiation. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $60
Hey Bob, I appreciate your interest!  $60 is quite a bit lower than what I need to make this work.  How about we split the difference?  I'm willing to go down to $105.  Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $105 is still a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $75

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I'm willing to work with you.  $75 is still a bit low for me, but I'm prepared to come down a little further. How about $90?  That's a good compromise, and it allows us both to get what we want.  What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $90 is still a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $85
